entry.content:
markItUp! Universal markup editor

markItUp! is a javascript over jQuery plug-in which allow you to turn any textarea in a markup editor.

markItUp! is a lightweight fully customizable engine made to easily fit all developers needs in their CMS, blogs, forums or websites.

Html, Textile, Wiki Syntax, Markdown, BBcode or even your own Markup system can be easily implemented.

  • integrate it easily

  • customize toolbar and css look and feel

    • skins
    • icons

  • use the engine from anywhere in the page
